TopicTitle: Are there any (colored) 'strobe' lights that are part of a mod?

Articles.Content: What Im trying to do is to put thirty six pylons with colored (red probably) strobe lights mounted on top in a circle with a radius of six meters (Geometry and MechJeb have already helped me to do the math). The only problem is I am not aware of any mobs that include lights like this. If someone would please be so kind as to point me in the right direction, Id be very grateful =P
Hmmm I KNOW THERE ITS OUT THERE! idk where tho
One exists, you might have to look back a few months worth of threads in the plugin forum though. Might even be in the archives by now.
Not sure if this is what you\'re looking for, but it does include colored lasers http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=11083.0

I think this might be what you\'re looking for. Took me a few days of combing the forum to find it again.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=8535.msg194952#msg194952

Not sure if they\'re still available or not, haven\'t tried to download them myself, but it\'s a place to start!
